AD__KethericExperiment1.synopsis:
Bone sculptures that Ketheric have built when turning to Myrkul during his containment in Thorm's mausoleum. Since he used material at hand some if not many of these are actually Thorm family members of the past generations.

This one looks like a dozen or so skulls connected together in a circle with bones like candles sticking from the top.

AD__KethericExperiment2.synopsis: This is the totem about human size with the base of pyramid build from skulls and the top of 3 skulls built inside the circle

AD__KethericExperiment1_0.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment1_0.text: *The ancestors of Ketheric Thorm, arranged into macabre totems - but why?*

AD__KethericExperiment1_1.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment1_1.text: *A totem dedicated to Myrkul. Ketheric Thorm ransacked the graves of his ancestors to honour his new god.*

AD__KethericExperiment1_2.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment1_2.text: *Ancient bones, disturbed from their final rest to form a bizarre sort of artwork. But by who, and why?*

AD__KethericExperiment2_0.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment2_0.text: *Ketheric Thorm dishonoured the very bones of his ancestors to make this totem to Myrkul.*

AD__KethericExperiment2_1.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment2_1.text: *Ketheric Thorm's ancestors, desecrated and arranged into foul artworks. But why?*

AD__KethericExperiment2_2.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment2_2.text: *Reclaimed bones, turned into strange effigies. Their meaning is lost on you.*

AD__KethericExperiment3_0.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment3_0.text: *Ketheric Thorm's forebears. He defiled their remains so he could pay homage to Myrkul.*

AD__KethericExperiment3_1.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment3_1.text: *Exhumed bones, put on display with a profane flair of artistry.*

AD__KethericExperiment3_2.speaker: Narrator
AD__KethericExperiment3_2.text: *Ketheric Thorm's forebears. He defiled their remains to make this effigy. But to what end?*
